医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
15 岁之前吸烟与慢性阻塞性肺病 (COPD) 风险较高相关一项新研究表明，15 岁之前儿童时期吸烟会增加患慢性阻塞性肺病 (COPD) 的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250107/Smoking-before-age-15-linked-to-higher-COPD-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250107/Smoking-before-age-15-linked-to-higher-COPD-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=deabd3cb-16f9-4165-b3d5-6b6dbd69352b Tue, 07 Jan 2025 09:35:39 -0500 Smoking before age 15 linked to higher COPD risk
Myriad Genetics 和 MD 安德森合作评估分子残留疾病检测德克萨斯大学 MD 安德森癌症中心和 Myriad Genetics, Inc. 今天宣布建立为期五年的战略联盟，以加速 Myriad 分子残留病 (MRD) 检测的临床评估和开发。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250107/Myriad-Genetics-and-MD-Anderson-partner-to-evaluate-molecular-residual-disease-assay.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250107/Myriad-Genetics-and-MD-Anderson-partner-to-evaluate-molecular-residual-disease-assay.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=88d9aa35-b6ff-45e3-8d26-ad406a382a2c Tue, 07 Jan 2025 09:20:08 -0500 Myriad Genetics and MD Anderson partner to evaluate molecular residual disease assay
吸烟会增加慢性肾脏病的风险吗？研究人员确定吸烟是否会增加患慢性肾病的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250107/Does-smoking-increase-chronic-kidney-disease-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250107/Does-smoking-increase-chronic-kidney-disease-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c0c52c0c-9453-4616-a059-34c6ca6e1d08 Tue, 07 Jan 2025 09:19:00 -0500 Does smoking increase chronic kidney disease risk?
十分之一的新糖尿病病例与含糖饮料有关含糖饮料的消费正在导致全球数以百万计的糖尿病和心脏病病例，并造成严重的区域健康不平等。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250107/Sugar-sweetened-drinks-linked-to-1-in-10-new-diabetes-cases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250107/Sugar-sweetened-drinks-linked-to-1-in-10-new-diabetes-cases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=52fae8e2-e847-4d45-bf93-13ccc95a2437 Tue, 07 Jan 2025 09:15:00 -0500 Sugar-sweetened drinks linked to 1 in 10 new diabetes cases
较少剂量的 HPV 疫苗可能足以预防宫颈癌一项新的研究表明，对于女孩和年轻女性来说，一剂或两剂 HPV 疫苗可以与三剂疫苗一样有效地预防严重的宫颈病变。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250107/Fewer-doses-of-HPV-vaccine-may-be-sufficient-to-protect-against-cervical-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250107/Fewer-doses-of-HPV-vaccine-may-be-sufficient-to-protect-against-cervical-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=63ab9a39-550e-431d-90dd-36e3a547b4fa Tue, 07 Jan 2025 09:09:00 -0500 Fewer doses of HPV vaccine may be sufficient to protect against cervical cancer
MedAxiom 发布 2024 年心血管 APP 补偿和利用报告心血管组织绩效解决方案的主要来源 MedAxiom 发布了 2024 年心血管高级实践提供商 (APP) 薪酬和利用报告，其中包括来自 90 个提供商组织的 2023 年数据 - 响应率强劲。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250107/MedAxiom-releases-2024-Cardioangio-APP-Compensation-and-Utilization-Report.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250107/MedAxiom-releases-2024-Cardioangio-APP-Compensation-and-Utilization-Report.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=632b3a59-5922-43c2-946f-222af7339950 Tue, 07 Jan 2025 09:00:40 -0500 MedAxiom releases 2024 Cardiovascular APP Compensation and Utilization Report
脑细胞突触的差异可能解释自闭症和精神分裂症的脆弱性被称为第 5 层锥体神经元的特定脑细胞在我们的大脑处理信息的过程中发挥着至关重要的作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250107/Differences-in-brain-cell-synapses-may-explain-vulnerability-to-autism-and-schizophrenia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250107/Differences-in-brain-cell-synapses-may-explain-vulnerability-to-autism-and-schizophrenia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a6747b49-6134-44fc-87bd-2456792b14ab Tue, 07 Jan 2025 08:45:00 -0500 Differences in brain cell synapses may explain vulnerability to autism and schizophrenia
无论是否纯素食，植物性食品都能促进肠道微生物，改善健康研究显示不同饮食中的肠道微生物组特征不同，凸显了植物性食品的健康益处和红肉消费的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250107/Vegan-or-not-plant-based-foods-boost-gut-microbes-for-better-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250107/Vegan-or-not-plant-based-foods-boost-gut-microbes-for-better-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=58ebebee-f13f-4485-a45c-bf9dd896ae61 Tue, 07 Jan 2025 08:42:00 -0500 Vegan or not, plant-based foods boost gut microbes for better health
持续且日益严重的抑郁症与中国成年人较高的死亡风险有关研究揭示了五种抑郁症状轨迹，其中稳定-高和增加的模式显着增加了老年人的全因死亡风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250107/Persistent-and-increasing-depression-linked-to-higher-mortality-risk-in-Chinese-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250107/Persistent-and-increasing-depression-linked-to-higher-mortality-risk-in-Chinese-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=baf145de-fbb7-428f-b97d-5f58a73ed59c Tue, 07 Jan 2025 08:36:00 -0500 Persistent and increasing depression linked to higher mortality risk in Chinese adults
压力引起的免疫功能障碍与皮肤过敏恶化有关众所周知，心理压力会加剧皮肤过敏，但其潜在的分子机制仍知之甚少。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250107/Stress-induced-immune-dysfunction-linked-to-worsened-skin-allergies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250107/Stress-induced-immune-dysfunction-linked-to-worsened-skin-allergies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f2b2cb88-581a-481c-be7a-c950eadba3bf Tue, 07 Jan 2025 08:34:04 -0500 Stress-induced immune dysfunction linked to worsened skin allergies
